Starters Academy

We are creating an ecosystem of technologists, skillful creatives, software developers, enterprise architects, project managers, etc. creating solutions that positively impact our world and drive growth in the growing digital economy in Africa.

view courses

Starters Kids

Building a new generation of kids/young adults equipped with digital skills to create, innovate and thrive for the future of work and the growing digital economy in Africa. With our well trained facilitators we train kids and teenagers on digital skills and entrepreneurship skills through hands on fully practical school and home based training.

view curriculum

Starters for Business

Businesses are moving in the digital direction so we educate SMEs, individuals and even the large scale enterprise on how to move with the trend. There are different modes of operations and skills set required for advancement of business and we provide that and much more. We aim to help businesses grow, enabling startups with the necessary support required to bring them into the limelight of growth, innovation and digitalization.

learn more
